title: Elf
overview: Raised by Papa Elf (Bob Newhart), Buddy (Will Ferrell) comes to realize he doesn’t fit in with the other elves. Determined to find a place where he belongs, Buddy searches for his real dad – in New York City!

title: National Lampoon's Christmas Vacation
overview: Clark Griswold, the well-intentioned, walking disaster who has dragged his family through the horrors of traveling in two previous National Lampoon Vacation films, has decided to stay home for the holidays and the neighborhood will never be the same.

title: Harry Potter: Wizards of Baking
overview: Pairs of professional bakers compete to create spellbinding edible showpieces on the actual sets where the Harry Potter films were made.

title: The Sex Lives of College Girls
overview: From Emmy®-nominated writer/producer Mindy Kaling and Justin Noble, The Sex Lives of College Girls follows four suitemates as they navigate their new lives at Vermont’s prestigious Essex College. A bundle of hormones and contradictions, Kimberly, Bela, Leighton and Whitney are randomly assigned roommates who soon become the biggest figures in each others’ lives, proving equal parts lovable and chaotic in the process. Charting the roomies’ wild adventures and shameless highs and lows, this hilariously relatable comedy series explores the messy reality of the rollercoaster ride that is college.
originalTitle: The Sex Lives of College Girls

title: Music Box: Yacht Rock: A DOCKumentary
originalTitle: Music Box: Yacht Rock: A DOCKumentary

title: The Penguin
overview: The next chapter in Matt Reeves’ epic saga The Batman, this thrilling crime drama follows Oswald “Oz” Cobb’s (Oscar® nominee Colin Farrell) quest for control in Gotham City. With the city in peril following the seawall’s collapse, Oz seeks to fill the power vacuum left by the death of Carmine Falcone and finally give his mother Francis (Deirdre O’Connell) the life he’s always promised. But first, Oz must confront enemies new and old – including Carmine’s children, Sofia Falcone (Cristin Milioti) and Alberto Falcone (Michael Zegen); the Maroni family, led by their imprisoned patriarch, Salvatore Maroni (Clancy Brown); and Oz’s own demoralizing reputation as “The Penguin.”

title: The Polar Express
overview: In this live action and animated movie, a disillusioned little boy, clad in his pyjamas, boards a magic train to the North Pole and has the adventure of a lifetime en route. On arrival, he tumbles down never-ending chutes and slides to land in the middle of Santa's workshop. A Christmas classic!

title: A Christmas Story
overview: Young Ralphie Parker tries to convince his parents to get him a Red Ryder BB gun for Christmas in 1940s Indiana.

title: Somebody Somewhere
overview: A Kansas woman (Bridget Everett) finds the passion and joy missing from her life thanks to a group of outsiders in this comedy series.

title: Watchmen: Chapter I
overview: In an alternate world history set in 1985, a government sponsored superhero is killed.

title: 1000-lb Sisters
overview: Tipping the scales at over 1,000 pounds combined, the Slaton sisters try to lose enough weight to qualify for and undergo life-changing bariatric surgery and pursue their dreams.

title: The Goonies
overview: A pair of brothers hope to save their house by following a treasure map and taking their friends along on a subterranean sea adventure.

title: Gold Rush
overview: Motivated by a depressed economy, hard-working gold miners get to work both in America and across the globe in an attempt to strike it rich.

title: The Hangover
overview: When three friends finally come to after a raucous night of bachelor-party revelry, they find a baby in the closet and a tiger in the bathroom. But they can't seem to locate their best friend, Doug – who's supposed to be tying the knot.

title: Clash of the Titans
overview: In "Clash of the Titans," the ultimate struggle for power pits men against kings and kings against gods. But the war between the gods themselves could destroy the world. Born of a god but raised as a man, Perseus (Sam Worthington) is helpless to save his family from Hades (Ralph Fiennes), vengeful god of the underworld.

title: Holiday Baking Championship
overview: Eight bakers enter the kitchen to show off their traditions and baking skills.
